title: Understanding Biofeedback
text: Biofeedback is a technique that helps individuals gain control over certain physiological functions. It involves using electronic monitoring to provide information about physiological processes, with the goal of improving health and performance.

hintAnswer: monitoring and controlling physiological responses to improve physical and mental health
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes biofeedback?
choices: individual’s ability to bounce back from adversity, trauma, or significant stress
patterns of negative thinking often associated with higher anxiety levels
monitoring and controlling physiological responses to improve physical and mental health
